wikipedia_page.main: Steven McDermott (born 30 December 1964) is an English former footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Darlington. He was an apprentice with Sunderland, and also played non-league football for Esh Winning. McDermott joined Darlington in November 1982, and made two substitute appearances for the club, both 2–0 defeats in the Fourth Division, on 4 December 1982 at home to Wimbledon and in their next match, away to Hartlepools United.
